body: Hi everyone! I am a beginner in Ladybug & Honeybee. First thanks a lot for the work all of you do in the Ladybug & Honeybee. I am just using it to calculate the DGI of the window, but now I am meeting several problems. So I want to know Thanks a lot in advance! topic: How to get the DGI results through the year?
